A4.text: The Dolphins appeared in Super Bowl XVII and Super Bowl XIX, losing both games.

A5.text: The Dolphins won Super Bowl VIII, becoming the first team to appear in three consecutive Super Bowls.

A6.text: The Dolphins would appear in but lose two more, XVII and XIX.

A7.text: The team entered the 1974 season as two-time defending Super Bowl champions.

A8.text: The Dolphins finished the 1972 season 14â€“0, winning Super Bowl VII.

A9.text: The Dolphins have not appeared in a Super Bowl since the 1972 season, when they won Super Bowl VII.
